name: AsAboveSoBelow (Kdean)
description:
This is my submission for Epic MagaJam 2022,

It's going to be a work in progress that I intend to complete. Had many challenges and as a result, I'm not near were I would have liked. However, I'm submitting what I have accomplished.

Keyboard

WforwardSrightAleftDbackLeft ArrowL turnRight ArrowR turnSpace barFireESCPause/Quit

Game Controller
Left stick - Forward/Backward/Left/Right

Left & Right riggers = turn right/left

Right bumper = fire

If you like what you see so far, give a follow
